title: Miami Heat 's revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018/19 to 2014/15.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2005/06 to 2001/02.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2010/11 to 2007/08.
But, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2014/15 to 2012/13.
But, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012/13 to 2010/11.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2007/08 to 2005/06.
gold: The statistic shows the revenue of the Miami Heat franchise from the 2001/02 season to the 2018/19 season . In 2018/19 , the estimated revenue of the National Basketball Association franchise amounted to 294 million U.S. dollars . Miami Heat The Miami Heat is a professional basketball team of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) .
